Prophetic Certainty.name: Prophetic Certainty
Prophetic Certainty.fullText:
Champion of Prophecy Utility 26Prophetic Certainty

Buoyed by a succession of victories, you unleash a potent attack.

Encounter  
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: You gain a bonus to your next attack roll before the end of your next turn. The bonus is equal to +2 per milestone that you’ve reached since your last extended rest.


Published in Eberron Player's Guide, page(s) 80.
